entry.title: Hug Day Pictures, Images, Photos Greetings
entry.content:
best Valentine’s Day 2014 Images, Pictures Photos

best Valentine’s Day 2014 Images, Pictures Photos

A heart breaking isn’t always as loud as aBomb exploding sometimesIt can by as quiet as a feather falling andThe most hurting thing is, no one really hears it except you.

I hate her!!! By the sea I saw her stand all alone,
I saw my fade shadow next to her.
What was I whispering to her?
I wish I knew me better,
My memories are fading, as I am dying,
My memories are fading, but why is that sweet heart,
I still have her memories

On Promise Day ..
What Bussnise Math Says ….
“” Promises make debt
and debt makes promises. “”

In ’1992′
Boy : Im in love with you !
Girl : Im in a Relationship
Boy : Ok (Commits Suicide) o_O
In ’2002′
Boy :Im in Love with you :|
Girl: Im in a Relationship !
Boy: Okay I will find Another One ! :P
In’2012′
Boy: Im in love with you :P
Girl:Im in a Relationship :S
Boy : Okay I will wait for your ‘BREAK UP’ :D

entry.title: Most Popular Happy Lohri Greeting Sms Messages
entry.content:
**best Happy Lohri sms in hindi**

Lohri is a popular bonfire festival of Sikhs and Hindus, Lohri is celebrated by the punjabi people all around the world. Happy Lohri sms in hindi is a great way to wish a warm Happy lohri to fellows, wherever punjabis and Indian Hindus lives on the living planet Lohri is celebrated in various forms, during the freezing cold weather in the middle of the first month (January) of every year. The Happy Lohri celebration is incomplete without Happy Lohri sms in hindi thats the reason here we bring Happy Lohri sms in hindi, for you so that you can greet Happy Lohri to everyone with beautiful Happy Lohri sms in hindi along with lots of love and happiness. you can download these best Happy Lohri sms in hindi to wish great Happy Lohri to all your loved ones. Here are many nice Happy Lohri sms in hindi you can download or save any of these Happy Lohri sms in hindi all for you

**best Happy Lohri sms in hindi**

Sardi ki thartharahat mein, moongfali, rewari aur gur ki mithas ke saath, Lohri mubaarak ho pyar, dosti aur rishtey ki garmahat ke saath Wish you a very Happy Lohri. May your life be as colorful and joyful as the festival of Lohri.
